description: Rhea stands on a rain-soaked rooftop, her silhouette framed against a sprawling metropolis of towering skyscrapers. Holographic billboards flash vibrant advertisements, and the glow of flying cars illuminates the dark sky. Rhea is dressed in a sleek, futuristic trench coat, her cybernetic enhancements subtly glowing on her arms.
characters: I can't let the shadows of my past dictate my future.

dialogue.text: I can't let the shadows of my past dictate my future.

speech_bubbles.text: I can't let the shadows of my past dictate my future.

effects.description: Raindrops splattering against the panel, with a slight glow from the neon lights reflecting off the wet surfaces.

description: In a dark alley, Rhea faces a group of thugs who have drawn weapons. Her expression is calm and focused as she prepares to engage. The alley is dimly lit by flickering neon lights, creating a stark contrast with the shadows.
characters: You picked the wrong night to mess with me.

dialogue.text: You picked the wrong night to mess with me.

speech_bubbles.text: You picked the wrong night to mess with me.

effects.description: Motion lines to indicate Rhea’s swift movements as she dodges an attack, along with a dynamic sound effect like 'SWISH!'

description: Inside a high-security lab, Rhea and Max are crouched behind a row of computers. Holographic screens project data and security feeds. Max is typing rapidly on a portable device, while Rhea watches the door with a determined look.
characters: If you trip the alarm, I’m blaming you.

dialogue.text: If you trip the alarm, I’m blaming you.

speech_bubbles.text: If you trip the alarm, I’m blaming you.

effects.description: Glowing holographic data streams surrounding them, with a red warning light pulsing in the background.

description: In a luxurious penthouse, the CEO of the corporation stands in front of a massive window overlooking the city. Rhea confronts him, her posture assertive, as she reveals the truth behind the disappearances. The room is opulent, with dark colors and glowing screens.
characters: You thought you could play god without consequences. You’re wrong.

dialogue.text: You thought you could play god without consequences. You’re wrong.

speech_bubbles.text: You thought you could play god without consequences. You’re wrong.

effects.description: A dramatic lighting effect illuminating Rhea’s face, casting deep shadows to emphasize the tension of the moment.
